title: Oops! That page does not exist.
content:
We're moving! Climate Kids will have a new home at NASA Space Place, so check over there for fun Earth content if you can't find it here.
Big Questions
What does global climate change mean?
What is the big deal with carbon?
What is the greenhouse effect?
How do we know the climate is changing?
What is happening to the oceans?
What else do we need to find out?
